divs: Sighting DetailsMy girlfriend pointed out 3 lights in a triangular formation while at a drive in movie. The lead light was about twice as bright as the two following and the back end of the triangle was narrower than the sides. The lights were all white and non blinking. We weren't able to tell if it was a solid object or three objects in formation because it didn't pass in front of any of the visible stars. It moved very slowly to the south east then faded from view.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Brownsville
There were no other sightings in Brownsville on or around June 23rd 2005
Summary: Triangular formation of 3 lights moving very slowly.
